Issue.creator: vladimirwork
Issue.summary: Pool doesn't come back to consensus
Issue.description: send NYM.{color} 1. Stop Node6 -> send NYM. 2. Stop Node5 -> send NYM. 3. Start Node6 -> send NYM. 4. Start Node5 -> send NYM. Actual Results: Pool doesn't come back to consensus after Step 3. NYMs in Steps 3,4 are not written to the ledger. Expected Results: Pool should come back to consensus after Step 3. NYMs in Steps 3,4 should be sent successfully. >
